description:
Rokudo`s fight with Iinuma has an unpredictable outcome, which solidifies his decision to try and secure his ideal school life by standing up for himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le boss du lycée t’a dans le collimateur
Omae, Uchi no Banchou ni Nerawareteruzo
The Top Dog at Our School Is After You
お前, ウチの番長に狙われてるぞ
